name: nodejs-0.6

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_LOG_DIR
properties.description: Directory to store application log files.

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_TMP_DIR
properties.description: Directory to store application temporary files.

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_REPO_DIR
properties.description: Application root directory where application files reside. This directory is reset every time you do a git-push

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_INTERNAL_PORT
properties.description: Internal port to which the web-framework binds to.

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_INTERNAL_IP
properties.description: Internal IP to which the web-framework binds to.

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_APP_DNS
properties.description: Fully qualified domain name for the application.

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_APP_NAME
properties.description: Application name

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_DATA_DIR
properties.description: Directory to store application data files. Preserved across git-pushes. Not shared across gears.

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_APP_UUID
properties.description: Unique ID which identified the application. Does not change between gears.

properties.name: OPENSHIFT_GEAR_UUID
properties.description: Unique ID which identified the gear. This value changes between gears.

description: Node.js is a platform built on Chrome's JavaScript runtime for easily building fast, scalable network applications. Node.js is perfect for data-intensive real-time applications that run across distributed devices.
